Race-Frostborn -- Male Frostborn Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Heat Lethargy: -1 attribute rolls at temperatures above 52
Winter Soul: +2 Vigor (resist cold)
Skills (13 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Hearthlands): (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Heat Lethargy: -1 skill rolls at temperatures above 52
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0 Deity: Hoenir
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 3 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Skill: 1
Features
Edges (0 points): Hindrances: Delusional; Stubborn; Vow Frostborn Features: Frigid Form; Heat Lethargy; Outsider; Winter Soul
Feature Notes:
Delusional: Has harmless conspiracy belief
Stubborn: Never admits error
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 5 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 5 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Winter Soul: +2 Armor vs. cold attacks
Arcana
Powers:
Armor: (2 PP) RTouch Gives +2 Armor (Raise +4) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R4" Target gains protection from hazards and -4 damage from like sources (Raise -6) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Smite: (2 PP) R4" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Speed: (1 PP) RTouch Target dbl Pace (Raise also Run as free action) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Reduces target multi-action penalty by 2)
Arcana Notes: Frigid Form: May cast cold Armor, Environmental Protection, Smite, and Speed on self at will
